pkgmetadata.longdescription: Elegant Scientific Themed Reporting for 'Markdown' // Offers 'markdown' output formats designed with various scientific styles, allowing users to generate PDF and HTML outputs. The output has a contemporary appearance with vibrant visuals, providing numerous styles for effective highlighting. The package also includes additional features specifically tailored for front-page slides, enhancing the overall presentation and customization options. The package was created using the 'tufte' https://rstudio.github.io/tufte/ package code as a starting point.
